title: Did an article in 1922 mention that Hitler was not interested in anti - Semitism?
subtitle: The First New York Times report on Adolf Hitler misjudged the ferocity of anti-Semitism.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to an article published in The New York Times in 1922, Adolf Hitler was "just using anti-Semitic propaganda as bait to catch a crowd of followers."
